City Council
============

The La Joya City Council is composed of five officials, elected at large.  The Council is among the best trained to respond to natural or civil emergencies.  The entire Council recently completed training in the
and are all member of the La Joya
.

* [Texas Association of Mayors, Councilmember & Commissioners](https://www.tml.org/266/TAMCC)
